quality: ultra-detailed, cinematic, elegant realism, high texture fidelity
style: refined historical portrait, graceful but grounded

appearance.body: medium height, lean and resilient from dockside work, practical posture
appearance.face: oval face, straight brows, calm sharp eyes, faint old scar near right temple, subtle sun-touched skin
appearance.hair: black long hair tied into a low functional knot with cloth ribbon, a few loose strands in river wind
appearance.outfit: hemp inner shirt, dark indigo outer robe with narrow sleeves, weathered leather waist belt, practical skirt-pants suited for ferry docks
appearance.accessories: abacus pouch at waist, wax-sealed ledger book, bronze key ring, plain cloth wrist guard
appearance.background: river ferry checkpoint at dusk, wooden piers, cargo boats, distant county gate with watchfire, subtle mist over water
appearance.pose: one hand holding a ledger, the other hand pressing robe edge against river wind, looking toward an incoming ferry
appearance.camera: full-body 3/4 portrait, eye-level, 50mm lens, cinematic composition

narrative.first_impression: 看起来温和克制，但眼神里有长期处理风险账目的警觉。
narrative.closeup_desc: 她的眼神总是先看货单再看人，右鬓旧伤不显眼，却让面部线条多了几分冷静。
narrative.fullbody_desc: 衣着以耐磨实用为主，行走稳而快，腰间算袋与账册说明她在渡口体系中的关键位置。
narrative.prop_story: 这本账册记录过一次洪水夜的物资转运名单，她因此救下了几十户沿岸百姓。
